00028 #include "FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 template<unsigned DIM>
00032 AbstractCellCycleModel* FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::CreateCellCycleModel()
00033 {
00034     return new FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel();
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 double FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GetTypicalTransitCellCycleTime()
00040 {
00041     return CancerParameters::Instance()->GetTransitCellG1Duration()
00042             + CancerParameters::Instance()->GetSG2MDuration();
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 template<unsigned DIM>
00047 double FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GetTypicalStemCellCycleTime()
00048 {
00049     return CancerParameters::Instance()->GetStemCellG1Duration()
00050             + CancerParameters::Instance()->GetSG2MDuration();
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template<unsigned DIM>
00055 bool FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::CellsCanDifferentiate()
00056 {
00057     return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 template<unsigned DIM>
00062 void FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GenerateBasic(std::vector<TissueCell>& rCells,
00063                                                            const unsigned numCells)
00064 {
00065     rCells.clear();
00066     rCells.reserve(numCells);
00067 
00068     for (unsigned i=0; i<numCells; i++)
00069     {
00070         AbstractCellCycleModel* p_cell_cycle_model = CreateCellCycleModel();
00071         TissueCell cell(STEM, HEALTHY, p_cell_cycle_model);
00072         double birth_time = 0.0 - i;
00073         cell.SetBirthTime(birth_time);
00074         rCells.push_back(cell);
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 template<unsigned DIM>
00080 void FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GenerateGivenLocationIndices(std::vector<TissueCell>& rCells,
00081                                                                           const std::vector<unsigned> locationIndices)
00082 {
00083     assert(!locationIndices.empty());
00084 
00085     unsigned num_cells = locationIndices.size();
00086 
00087     rCells.clear();
00088     rCells.reserve(num_cells);
00089 
00090     for (unsigned i=0; i<num_cells; i++)
00091     {
00092         AbstractCellCycleModel* p_cell_cycle_model = CreateCellCycleModel();
00093         TissueCell cell(STEM, HEALTHY, p_cell_cycle_model);
00094         double birth_time = 0.0 - locationIndices[i];
00095         cell.SetBirthTime(birth_time);
00096         rCells.push_back(cell);
00097     }
00098 }

00105 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<1>;
00106 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<2>;
00107 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<3>;
